item.title: Anthropic凭借（主要）由AI构建的协作工具引发病毒式传播
item.description: 这家人工智能公司的新产品已使软件行业的大部分企业处于高度戒备状态。【原文：The AI company’s newest product has put much of the software industry on alert.】

item.title: 美联储面临资产负债表规模的"三重困境"
item.description: 美联储经济学家表示，在停止缩减其6.5万亿美元资产组合后，美联储必须应对其资产负债表规模应如何调整的问题。【原文：The Federal Reserve has to grapple with the question of how big its balance sheet should be after it stopped shrinking its $6.5 trillion portfolio, according to economists at the central bank.】

item.title: 工业企业麦迪逊航空据悉寻求20亿美元以上IPO融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，通风与过滤系统供应商麦迪逊空气公司正计划在美国首次公开募股中筹集至少20亿美元资金。【原文：Madison Air, a provider of ventilation and filtration systems, is seeking to raise at least $2 billion in a US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能编程初创公司Replit估值达90亿美元，即将完成融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，人工智能编程初创公司Replit Inc.即将完成新一轮融资，其估值将翻三倍至90亿美元，该估值包含已筹集资金。【原文：Replit Inc., an artificial intelligence coding startup, is nearing a deal for a new round of funding that would roughly triple its valuation to $9 billion, including the money raised, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: NEC的哈塞特称自己足够强硬，能在美联储辩论中取胜
item.description: 国家经济委员会主任凯文·哈塞特——这位美联储下任主席的热门人选——驳斥了外界对其上任后将缺乏说服其他央行行长支持其观点能力的担忧。【原文：National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett, a front-runner to become the next Federal Reserve chair, rejected concerns that he would lack the ability to swing other central bankers behind his views should he get the job.】

item.title: 私募股权公司NGP斥资2亿美元押注美国电池产业，人工智能推动电力需求激增
item.description: 私募股权公司NGP能源资本管理公司正向一家美国新兴储能开发商注资2亿美元，因数据中心推动电力需求创纪录增长。【原文：Private equity firm NGP Energy Capital Management is backing a new US energy-storage developer with $200 million as data centers spur record power demand growth.】

item.title: 大学篮球运动员被控操纵比赛以赢取赌注
item.description: 联邦检察官指控包括大学篮球运动员在内的二十余人，涉嫌在美国和中国实施长达数年的操纵比赛计划，该计划产生了数百万美元的非法赌资。【原文：More than two dozen people, including college basketball players, were charged by federal prosecutors alleging a yearslong scheme to fix games in the US and China that generated millions of dollars in illegal wagers.】

item.title: 前太平洋投资管理公司高管凭借灾难债券ETF创下里程碑
item.description: 一只与自然灾害押注挂钩的交易所交易基金已在伦敦开始交易，此前该基金成为首只吸引到首席做市商的此类ETF。【原文：An exchange-traded fund tied to bets on natural disasters has started trading in London, after becoming the first such ETF to attract a lead market maker.】

item.title: 高盛第四季度股权资本市场收入领跑华尔街
item.description: 高盛集团在去年第四季度重返华尔街股权资本市场收入榜首，各大银行正为争夺2026年预期中的重磅首次公开募股项目争相角逐。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. returned to the top of Wall Street’s equity capital markets revenue leaderboard in the final quarter of last year, as banks jostle for roles on the blockbuster initial public offerings expected in 2026.】

item.title: 白领犯罪执法力度在特朗普执政期间大幅削弱，公共公民组织称
item.description: 据进步倡导组织"公共公民"披露，特朗普政府在首个任期内至少撤销了162项针对企业的执法行动，并暂停了另外14项。【原文：The Trump administration canceled at least 162 corporate enforcement actions and halted 14 more in its first year back in office, according to progressive advocacy group Public Citizen.】

item.title: 比尔·盖茨创投基金、宝马和加拿大支持锂精炼企业
item.description: 锂精炼企业红树林水技术公司从加拿大增长基金、宝马集团旗下i Ventures以及比尔·盖茨支持的突破能源公司获得8500万美元融资。【原文：Lithium refiner Mangrove Water Technologies Inc. secured $85 million from the Canada Growth Fund, BMW AG’s i Ventures and Bill Gates-backed Breakthrough Energy LLC.】

item.title: 美台达成协议 削减关税 促进投资
item.description: 美国与台湾达成一项期待已久的贸易协定，将该自治岛屿商品的关税降至15%，同时台湾半导体企业将为美国业务增加5000亿美元融资。【原文：The US and Taiwan agreed to a long-sought trade pact that would lower tariffs on goods from the self-governed island to 15% and see Taiwanese semiconductor companies increase financing for American operations by $500 billion.】

item.title: 银行CEO称创纪录的1340亿美元交易收益只是开始
item.description: 摩根士丹利首席执行官泰德·皮克在华尔街创下交易佳绩的一年后，用四个字总结了他的展望："形势一片大好。"【原文：Morgan Stanley Chief Executive Officer Ted Pick started summing up his outlook after Wall Street’s banner year for trading with four words: “The setup is ideal.”】

item.title: 高盛任命贝莱德的林南为首席信贷策略师
item.description: 贝莱德公司宏观信贷研究主管阿曼达·莱南在该资产管理公司任职三年后，即将重返高盛集团。【原文：Amanda Lynam, head of macro credit research at BlackRock Inc., is returning to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. after three years with the asset management firm.】

item.title: 播客面临的新最大威胁：聆听时代的终结
item.description: 疲于奔命的消费者正在尝试新方法，试图在不完整收听播客的情况下，尽可能多地获取播客信息。【原文：Harried consumers are testing new ways to cram as much podcast information into their brains as possible without listening to full episodes】

item.title: 西班牙计划设立105亿欧元"主权基金"，以配合欧盟下一代计划
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗·桑切斯表示，该国将启动一项105亿欧元（约合122亿美元）的投资基金，以在欧盟疫情复苏计划结束之后继续支持本国经济。【原文：Spain will launch a €10.5 billion ($12.2 billion) investment fund to maintain support for its economy after European Union pandemic-recovery efforts wind down, Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez said.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉石油行业在遭受网络攻击后转用WhatsApp运作
item.description: 委内瑞拉石油工业在国营石油巨头委内瑞拉石油公司遭受网络攻击后的一个月里，通过电话和手写报告维持日常运营。【原文：Venezuela’s oil industry is running its day-to-day operations via phone calls and handwritten reports in the month since a cyberattack on state-owned oil giant Petróleos de Venezuela SA.】

item.title: 美联储施密德称政策应保持紧缩以抑制通胀
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰夫·施密德表示，利率应维持在能对经济持续施加一定压力的水平，以便进一步抑制通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeff Schmid said interest rates should stay at a level where they continue to put some pressure on the economy so that inflation can cool further.】

item.title: 债券市场一片寂静，过于寂静
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了奇趣世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森索尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的贡献。无论内容如何，我们保证始终精彩纷呈。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 由BMO牵头的贷款方推动Ssense清算，而非创始人收购
item.description: 加拿大奢侈时尚零售商Ssense的一批贷款方正试图阻止一项交易，该交易将允许其创始人通过破产程序收购公司。贷款方认为，清算程序能使他们收回更多现金。【原文：A group of lenders to Canadian luxury fashion retailer Ssense are trying to block a deal that would allow its founders to buy the company out of bankruptcy, arguing that liquidation would let them recover more cash.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表格里尔等人将在车展上宣传汽车的可负担性
item.description: 特朗普政府的三名官员本周将视察福特汽车公司和斯泰兰蒂斯集团在俄亥俄州的工厂，此行旨在彰显国内制造业实力与产品可负担性。【原文：A trio of Trump administration officials will visit Ford Motor Co.’s and Stellantis NV’s Ohio operations this week, in a swing to highlight both domestic manufacturing and affordability.】

item.title: Netflix将在索尼电影全球院线上映后提供流媒体服务
item.description: 网飞公司获得了索尼集团旗下电影在影院上映结束后全球流媒体播放权，由此新增好莱坞最大制片厂之一的影片资源。【原文：Netflix Inc. obtained global streaming rights to Sony Group Corp.’s films after they complete their run in theaters, adding releases from one of Hollywood’s biggest studios.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将出售80亿美元美元债券
item.description: 摩根士丹利正出售80亿美元债券，华尔街银行在财报发布后纷纷涌入债券市场。【原文：Morgan Stanley is selling $8 billion of bonds as Wall Street banks flood the debt markets after earnings.】

item.title: 佩特罗承诺下调哥伦比亚汽油价格，政策出现重大转变
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃·佩特罗表示将下调汽油价格，此举与其执政初期逐步取消燃油补贴以缩小财政赤字的政策形成反转。【原文：Colombian President Gustavo Petro said he will cut gasoline prices, a reversal of the policy in his first years in office when he phased out fuel subsidies to narrow the fiscal deficit.】

item.title: Xreal对竞争对手智能眼镜制造商Viture提起专利诉讼
item.description: 中国智能眼镜先驱企业Xreal公司已在美国起诉Viture公司侵犯专利权，指控其竞争对手不公平地利用了Xreal在该领域的大量研究和投资成果。【原文：Xreal Inc., a Chinese pioneer in smart glasses, is suing Viture Inc. for patent infringement in the US, arguing its rival has unfairly capitalized on Xreal’s extensive research and investment in the segment.】

item.title: 凯雷集团称财富管理业务自2023年以来实现翻番增长
item.description: 自2023年哈维·施瓦茨出任首席执行官以来，凯雷集团的财富管理业务规模已接近翻番，目前该业务占集团资金流量的比重预计将达到20%。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc.’s wealth business has nearly doubled since Harvey Schwartz became chief executive officer in 2023 and is on track to account for some 20% of the firm’s capital flows.】

item.title: 美国议员称英伟达在华审批将受内存短缺影响
item.description: 据众议院中国事务委员会首席共和党议员援引本周商务部颁布的法规条款称，内存芯片供应紧张将限制美国向英伟达公司发放向中国客户销售H200人工智能处理器的出口许可证数量。【原文：Tight memory chip supplies will constrain the number of US export licenses for Nvidia Corp. to sell its H200 artificial intelligence processors to Chinese customers, according to the top Republican on the House China committee, citing terms of a Commerce Department rule issued this week.】

item.title: 晨星公司称魁北克省长辞职加剧信贷不确定性
item.description: 信用评级机构晨星DBRS表示，魁北克省长弗朗索瓦·勒戈特突然辞职，为这个法语省份带来了新的不确定性，因为独立派魁北克党在民调中支持率上升。【原文：The sudden resignation of Quebec Premier Francois Legault is a new source of uncertainty for the French-speaking province as the separatist Parti Quebecois rises in polls, credit rating agency Morningstar DBRS said.】

item.title: 秘鲁经济意外大幅放缓，铜业领跌
item.description: 秘鲁11月经济增速远低于预期，主要原因是铜产量大幅下滑。【原文：Peru’s economy expanded much less than forecast in November due to a slump in copper output.】

item.title: 高盛探索预测市场机遇，所罗门表示
item.description: 高盛集团正寻求在预测市场中开拓机遇，使这家投行能够从快速发展的现实事件投注平台中获益。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is looking at opportunities in prediction markets, positioning the investment bank to benefit from the fast-growing forums for bets on real-world events.】
